summary: THE HORN ASSEMBLY WAS LOCATED INSIDE THE WHEEL  AND WAS COVERED WITH FINE LEATHER, DURING THE WINTER TIME, THE LEATHER BECAME STIFF.  THE HORN ONLY ACTIVATED IN THE  SUMMER TIME, AND THE LIVED WHERE THE WEATHER WAS COLD MOST OF THE TIME.   *AK   GM DID NOT AGREE TO HELP REMEDY THE PROBLEM.   *SCC   *JB
